title: Vision-Language Models for Automated Chest X-ray Interpretation: Leveraging ViT and GPT-2
details: MR Islam, MZ Hossain, M Ahmed, M Samu, S Sultana - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Radiology plays a pivotal role in modern medicine due to its non-invasive diagnostic capabilities. However, the manual generation of unstructured medical reports is time consuming and prone to errors. It creates a significant bottleneck in clinical …
